trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert 32-bit unsigned integer objects to and from various other representations.
trans-unit.target: 提供類型轉換器，將 32 位元不帶正負號的整數物件與其他各種表示相互轉換。

trans-unit.source: This converter can only convert a 32-bit unsigned integer object to and from a string.
trans-unit.target: 這個轉換子只可以將轉換的 32 位元不帶正負號的整數物件與字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.UInt32> value type represents unsigned integers with values ranging from 0 to 4,294,967,295.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.UInt32>實值類型代表不帶正負號的整數值範圍從 0 到 4,294,967,295。</xref:System.UInt32>

trans-unit.source: This data type is not supported in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中不支援這種資料類型。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should never create an instance of a UInt32Converter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您絕對不要建立 UInt32Converter 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基底類別和[How to︰ 實作類型轉換器](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.UInt32Converter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.UInt32Converter"></xref>類別。
